existing_en: Welcome to the cursed desert. Spin the wheel of fate to survive.
Purchase equipment (Common to Epic) via gambling at the Black Market; you can buy up to two items. Proceed with caution!
You stand in a dimly lit chamber within the pyramid, torchlight flickering on the walls...
The stone door on the left
The stone door on the right
You sense a murderous intent nearby...
A cloud of dust rises in the distance.
A terrifying roar echoes across the dunes.
You see strange footprints in the sand.
The wind carries the scent of a beast.
An overwhelming pressure crushes the air.
A colossal shadow blocks the sun.
The ground trembles from a deep roar.
You hear the sound of heavy armor.
A veteran of many battles is near.
This enemy is not like the others.
A champion of the desert stands guard.
Silence... the calm before the storm.
You see the ruins of a temple.
You are seized by sudden terror.
The leader of the pack is here.
The path is guarded by a giant.
You hear the faint sound of bells.
You spot a tent in the distance.
The smell of exotic spices drifts by.
You see a patch of green.
Palm trees are visible on the horizon.
Birds are flying towards the east.
The wind is picking up speed.
A howling wind drowns out all sound.
The sky turns brown with dust.
